Welcome to the Information Systems Lab

 

Information Systems Laboratory (ISL) is a deep learning research lab, focuses on information theoretic approach on variaous machine learning problems.

 

Previous Next

 

News

  • We are looking for passionate new PhD students, Master students, and Undergraduate Interns to join the team

  • Our group has 1 paper accepted to ECCV 2022
     - Prune Your Model Before Distill It
  • Our group has 1 paper accepted to ICML 2022
     - Neural Tangent Kernel Analysis of Deep Narrow Neural Networks
  • Our group has 1 paper accepted to AISTATS 2022
     - An Information-Theoretic Justification for Model Pruning
  • Our group has 1 paper accepted to ICML 2021
     - WGAN with an Infinitely Wide Generator Has No Spurious Stationary Points

We are part of the Electronic and Electrical Engineering at Hongik University.
